Name.BusinessNameLine1: UNITED WAY OF HARRISON COUNTY INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: THE ORGANIZATION IS THE PRIMARY FUNDRAISING ORGANIZATION FOR ALL UNITED WAY CHARITIES IN HARRISON COUNTY.
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO UNITE AND ORGANIZE THE RESIDENTS OF HARRISON COUNTY AND THE SURROUNDING AREA IN A VOLUNTEER EFFORT TO ASSESS THE AREAS NEEDS FOR HUMAN CARE SERVICES, TO DETERMINE WHAT SERVICES WILL BEST PROMOTE THE WELFARE OF THE RESIDENTS OF THE AREA AND TO AID IN THE DELIVERY OF SUCH SERVICES BY SOLICITING AND MAKING PRUDENT USE OF RESOURCES MADE AVAILABLE TO IT FROM ANY SOURCE.
IRS990.Description: THE UNITED WAY OF HARRISON COUNTY ENGAGES OUR COMMUNITY THROUGH VOLUNTEER EFFORTS TO IDENTIFY LOCAL ISSUES. WE THEN DEVELOP STRATEGIES USING ALL AVAILABLE RESOURCES TO ADDRESS THOSE ISSUES TO EFFECT POSITIVE CHANGE.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Identifier: DESCRIPTION OF INTENDED USE OF ENDOWMENT FUNDS:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS PRINCIPAL AND INCOME SHALL BE RETAINED IN THE FUND UNTIL THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS DETERMINES ITS WITHDRAWAL AND EXPENDITURE TO BE APPROPRIATE.
CHANGE IN VALUE OF BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN TRUSTS AND FOUNDATIONS 97,488. DIFFERENCE IN DONOR DESIGNATIONS -3,726.
CHANGE IN VALUE OF BENFECIAL INTEREST IN TRUSTS AND FOUNDATIONS 97,488. DIRECT FUND-RAISING EXPENSES 6,536.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: PROCEDURE FOR MONITORING GRANTS IN THE U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: SCHEDULE I, PART I, LINE 2: ALLOCATIONS: ORGANIZATIONS RECEIVING "DISCRETIONARY" FUNDING FROM UNITED WAY UNDERGO INTENSIVE PRE-SCREENING BEFORE BEING AWARDED FUNDING. SUCH SCREENING INCLUDES: AN APPLICATION PROCESS THAT INCLUDES EXPLANATION OF THE PROPOSED USE AND RESULTS FROM USE OF FUNDING FINANCIAL REVIEW OF THE ORGANIZATION TO GAIN A LEVEL OF ASSURANCE THAT THE ORGANIZATION FOLLOWS SOUND FISCAL POLICIES VERIFICATION OF COMPLIANCE WITH THE PROVISIONS OF THE PATRIOT ACT VERIFICATION OF CURRENT STATUS AS AN IRS CODE SECTION 501(C)(3) NONPORFIT ORGANIZATION OR OTHER IRS CODE SECTION THEY ARE REQUIRED TO PROVIDE THE UNITED WAY WITH A FINAL REPORT AT THE END OF THE ALLOCATION PERIOD THAT VERIFIES THAT ALL FUNDING HAS BEEN USED FOR THE PURPOSES INTENDED AND WHAT RESULTS WERE COMPARED TO THE PROPOSED RESULTS FROM THE ORGINIAL APPLICATION. DONOR DESIGNATIONS: ORGANIZATIONS RECEIVING DONOR DESIGNATED CONTRIBUTIONS THROUGH UNITED WAY UNDERGO SCREENING PRIOR TO DISTRIBUTION OF FUNDING SUCH SCREENING INCLUDES: VERIFICATION OF COMPLIANCE WITH THE PROVISIONS OF THE PATRIOT ACT VERIFICATION OF CURRENT STATUS AS AN IRS CODE SECTION 501(C)(3) NONPROFIT ORGANIZATION OR OTHER IRS CODE SECTION

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: A DRAFT OF THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND BOARD OF DIRECTORS BEFORE THE FINAL VERSION IS FILED WITH THE IRS.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: MEMBERS ARE GIVEN CONFLICT OF INTEREST QUESTIONAIRRES ANNUALLY AS PART OF THE ORGANZIATIONS MEMBERSHIP APPLICATION WITH THE UNITED WAY OF AMERICA. ANY CONFLICTS IDENTIFIED ARE HANDLED ACCORDINGLY.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS APPOINTS A COMMITTEE TO PROPOSE THE APPROPRIATE CEO SALARY. THE BOARD THEN VOTES ON THE PROPOSED SALARY.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: CHANGES IN NET ASSETS OR FUND BALANCES:
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: NET UNREALIZED GAINS ON INVESTMENTS: 206,575. PRIOR PERIOD ADJUSTMENTS: 51,419. CHANGE IN VALUE OF BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN TRUSTS AND FOUNDATIONS 97,488. DIFFERENCE IN DONOR DESIGNATIONS -3,726. TOTAL TO FORM 990, PART XI, LINE 5: 351,756.
